name: Postman Game 3 - Nail Polsih
description:
Story:

Denatika Tantalizer is a man on a mission. His goal is to usurp the dictator of his civilization, the United States, but for what gain? Follow his escapade in this short series revival of sorts, and prepare to face encounters with:

  • Government soldiers!
  • Government officials!
  • Strange, otherworldly deities!

Truly, the character variety is stunning.

-

Key features:
  • A new and innovative X-Ray battle system never seen before in RPG Maker! Disable your enemy's limbs to get the upper hand in battle!
  • A multitude of replay-ability options, such as choosing which one of two party members to take with you during a midpoint in the game.
  • Near-endless NPC variety! Every character is named and recognizable.
  • Surreal and animated battle backgrounds!
  • Midis galore!

-

Try to uncover the lore of the disciple's world yourself, or simply wait for the future installments. It will (not) all be explained in due time.

-

There are in fact two previous postman games, although they are pretty shoddy in terms of quality and outdated in terms of lore. You can search for them if you really want to, but it is unadvised for their lack of polish.

Saying it straight: Postman Games 1 and  2 are not canon.

-

Regardless; enjoy the product!

Any critique/comments/concerns/fanart (or if you just want to say hello) can be sent to spoonlordswinguss@gmail.com.
